processed_by.processor: Cui, Hong using Text2XML java application init commit r86, validated against beeSchema.xsd revision f0a80a8516a06e51224d01314403eb26d60f881d

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section arguti;species floridus;

treatment.description: Similar to no. 190; canes more corrugated (up to 3 m. high), with broader-based and more hooked prickles; terminal primocane-leaflet narrowly ovate, long-acuminate; corymbs (l-)2-7-flowered, the upper flowers standing high above the bracts, the latter with mostly narrower blades; pedicels elongate, often armed.
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: Borders of woods, Va. and southw. Fl. late April, May; fr. June, early July.
